title: Essential Luke Cage, Power Man, Vol. 1
description: Look out world, here he comes - Luke Cage, Hero for Hire - and bullets won't stop him The early adventures of comics' first and foremost black superstar of the seventies are collected for the first time in one volume as Power Man defends his home turf against the likes of Diamondback, Mace, Black Mariah, Dr. Doom, Senor Suerte, Chemistro, Lionfang, Steeplejack, Cottonmouth, and more Guest-starring the Fantastic Four, Spider-Man and Iron Man Collects Hero For Hire #1-#16 and Power Man #17-#27
author: Roy Thomas
